document.text:
From: BOBBI C 
STERNHEIM 
To: 
Cc 
, Christian Everdell 
Subject: Re: Ghislaine Maxwell 02879-509 
Date: Thu, 21 Jan 2021 13:49:54 +0000 
Thank you for responding. 
BOBBI C. STERNHEIM, ESQ. 
This message and any attached documents contain information from the Law Offices of Bobbi C. Sternheim 
that may be confidential and/or privileged. 
If you are not the intended recipient, you may not read, copy, distribute, or use this information. 
Ifyou have received this transmission in error, please notes the sender immediately by reply e-mail and then 
delete this message. Thank you. 
On 
Jan 21, 2021, 
at 
8:19 
ANI,
vrote: 
Good 
morning Bobbi: 
While I  understand the mail you have sent is time sensitive, there are 
BOP policies that must be complied with. All mail must be processed in 
a particular manner prior to being provided to an inmate. The legal 
department is not involved in the processing of mail for any inmates in 
Institution. The institution is not allowing visitors, therefore the 
mail may not be hand delivered, but again, the mail must be properly 
processed before provided to the inmate. Unfortunately, this is not 
something I can assist with. 
BOBBI C STERNHEIM 1/20/2021 1:27 PM >» 
EFTA00025015

Ms. Maxwell needs to review time-sensitive documents for filing on 
Monday 1/25. 
It appears that overnight express mail is not received next day and 
delivery to Ms.Maxwell is further delayed. 
Please let me know if we can hand-deliver legal mail for Ms. Maxwell to 
the MDC for direct deposit in the legal mail box. 
If so, can delivery to Ms. Maxwell be expedited? 
Your assistance is greatly appreciated. 
Bobbi 
BOBBI C. STERNHEIM, ESQ.

Confirmed. 
BOBBI C STERNHEIM 
Hope you enjoyed the weekend. 
Confirming this week's 
VTCs 
Tues- Fri. 12:30- 
3:30. 
Thank you-
Bobbi
